title: Generate this assembly from a c program
content:
I want to generate this assembly code: 
mov ecx, 
call ecx
How can I write and compile C code which generates this code?

comments.text: Is this about reverse engineering or about software engineering?
In fact i have reversed a program which contains that and i am wondering if it is possible to do that in c

(1) This is not clear enough. It depends a lot on the compiler, optimization level, and whether you're willing to use 
__asm__
. (2) It seems that you're having an XY problem. What are you trying to do?

You want specifically 
ecx
or any register that may do the job?
